oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Rieley Collection - tape 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 8 of various performances featuring Chubby Wise (performer), Curly Fox (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), , Tommy Magness (performer), and Red Herron (performer), in 1947 and other unidentified dates. Some recordings from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chubby Wise; Benny Martin; Tommy Magness; Red Herron; Curly Fox; Eddy Arnold; Lonzo and Oscar
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Alabama Jubilee ([Unidentified]) -- Up Jumped The Devil ([Unidentified]) -- Orange Blossom Special (Chubby Wise) -- Blue Goose Special (Chubby Wise) -- Fire On The Mountain (Benny Martin) -- John Henry (Benny Martin) -- Arkansas Traveler ([Unidentified]) -- Forked Deer (Tommy Magness) -- Devil's Dream (Tommy Magness) (incomplete) -- Roy Acuff talks -- Opening theme -- Back Up And Push (Red Herron) -- Boil Dem Cabbage Down ([Unidentified]) -- Dance Around Molly (Tommy Magness) -- [Unidentified tune] ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified tune] -- Bluegrass Stomp (Chubby Wise) -- Mule Skinner Blues (Chubby Wise) -- Katy Hill (Chubby Wise) -- Six More Miles (Chubby Wise) -- Fire On The Mountain ([Unidentified]) -- Old Joe Clark (Benny Martin) -- Down Yonder (Benny Martin) -- Wake Up Cory (Benny Martin) -- Polk County Breakdown (Tommy Magness) -- Drag The Bow ([Unidentified]) -- Black Mountain Rag (Curly Fox) -- Soldier's Joy (Tommy Magness) -- Florida Blues (Tommy Magness) -- Blackberry Blossom (Tommy Magness) -- Polk County Breakdown (Tommy Magness) -- Ida Red (Tommy Magness) -- Lost Indian (Tommy Magness) -- Up Jumped The Devil (Tommy Magness) -- [Unidentified tune] (Lonzo and Oscar) -- Darling What Is Life Without You (Eddy Arnold) -- I Bring Home The Bacon ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified tune] -- Will You Be Mine ([Unidentified]) -- Hold My Aching Head ([Unidentified]) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified tune] -- Somebody To Love ([Unidentified]) (incomplete)
